PrecisApproval of an amendment made to the Certificate (No. OC-43) issued to NOVAGAS CANADA PIPELINES LTD. by the National Energy Board, which takes into account that NovaGas has acquired and will integrate an existing pipeline into its project, as set forth in N.E.B. Order AO-1-OC-43.
